section.section: An injured inmate may file a claim for compensation against the State under this subtitle with the Board.
The Board may receive original papers representing a claim even if the State has not appropriated money to pay the claim.

text.section:
An injured inmate shall file a claim with the Board by the later of:
12 months after being released from the correctional facility; or
24 months after the date of injury.
The Board shall file and properly designate each claim by number, short title, or both.
